body: Please do something about the server lag. Minecraft is a very simple game there is no way that Avicus can't possible lag this much, but it does. Everyone wants more players to come to Avicus well first get rid of the crazy lag spikes that ruin the gamplay. (I know its not my computer now, its 100% server related I don't get this much lag on any other server). FPS lag, block lag and random damage lag fix one of them please.
body_tagged: Please do something about the server lag. Minecraft is a very simple game there is no way that Avicus can't possible lag this much, but it does. Everyone wants more players to come to Avicus well first get rid of the crazy lag spikes that ruin the gamplay. (I know its not my computer now, its 100% server related I don't get this much lag on any other server). FPS lag, block lag and random damage lag fix one of them please.
